segments.text: Hello , this is IBA Bank . Maria speaking , how may I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , I'm looking into your loans and I'm a little confused about the interest rates . Could you give me some advice ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not a problem . Which loan was it you were interested in ? Sorry , I must ask , because the interest rates can depend on the type of loan you apply for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . I'm interested in the Petty Consumer Loan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One of our most popular ! The usual interest rate is fixed by the PBC . That is The People's Bank of China . But of course , with some loans , credit rating and loan amount come into play , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , the rate could fluctuate a little , depending on the amount given by the PBC ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to have to do some more research into this . Thanks for your help , bye for now .
segments.speaker: S2
